abilities.name: Wild Growth
abilities.effect: Each Basic {G} Energy attached to all of your Pokémon provides {G}{G} Energy. The effect of Wild Growth doesn't stack.

attacks.name: Bring Down
attacks.effect: Choose a Pokémon in play (yours or your opponent's) that has the least HP remaining, except for this Pokémon, and it is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Water Shot
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Psychic Draw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this Ability. Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Powerful Hand
attacks.effect: Place 2 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon for each card in your hand.

abilities.name: Lunar Cycle
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if you have Solrock in play, you may discard a Basic {F} Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Draw 3 cards. You can't use more than 1 Lunar Cycle Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Disruptive Wind
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Balloon Return
attacks.effect: Put this Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) lose all Abilities that require those Pokémon to be Knocked Out.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) lose all Abilities that require those Pokémon to be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Psychic Draw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this Ability. Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Powerful Hand
attacks.effect: Place 2 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Accelerating Stab
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Accelerating Stab.
